entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the ANCM error when an app fails to start #43152
    7.0-rc1
  • What's the best choice for a non-root port for ASP.NET Core? #43149
  • [net7] Documentation updates for filters, OpenAPI, authentication #43145
  • [SignalR][TS Client] Typesafe connection #43144
  • Add overload with `AuthenticationProperties` to `SignInManager.ExternalLoginSignInAsync` #43138
  • Sessions - How to report / capture engagement information. #43137
    Discussions
  • Allow specifying host and port or port in ASPNETCORE_URLS #43135

Closed

  • [Feature Request] gRPC does not have HTTP protocol version negotiation in unencrypted environments #42948
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow writing to user-secrets from code #43139
    Discussions
  • Is there a way to drag diagram to design via blazor? #42976
  • [Blazor Server] Warn developer if the <base/> tag is missing from the root layout #43146
  • SignalR connections start slower and slower in Firefox in VS 2022 (up to 60 seconds) #40453
    7.0-rc1
  • WebApplicationBuilder should not Require wwwroot Directory #38857
    7.0-rc1
  • Roll back the template to use an organized structure #43126
  • Error in new componet in blazor #43127

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] macOS dev-certs - Handle keychain paths with spaces #43148
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, 6.0.x
  • Try to update SDK version after updating arcade #43147
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `d5773b7` to `bbd5404` #43140
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dd7a9d2` to `5b909be` #43141
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Obsolete LeakTrackingObjectPool and LeakTrackingObjectPoolProvider #43106
    area-runtime
  • Remove IsAvailable check on CommitAsync. #43059
    area-runtime
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime
  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Add analyzer to suggest top level route registration #42937
    area-infrastructure
  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion
  • Fix route handler analyzer test culture warnings #43107
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add overload with `AuthenticationProperties` to `SignInManager.ExternalLoginSignInAsync` #43132
    area-identity, community-contribution
